description: Overview of the OauthCancelledError method
---

Constructor for initializing an error indicating that the OAuth flow was
cancelled.

<Note>
  `OauthCancelledError` extends `BaseError`, see the docs for BaseError for all
  supported methods.
</Note>

## Import

```ts
import { OauthCancelledError } from "@account-kit/signer";
```
